name: Planet Escape (jtoledo)
description:
Description:

“Planet Escape” is a Unity game made in two days (in our spare time) by our little team consisting of two Chilean Developers:

  • Jimmy Toledo Araya
  • Jose Miguel Lopez

Here you can see our entry for the Ludum Dare 42 Challenge, if you wanna give us feedback.

The player takes control of an adventurous spaceship lost in a desert shrinking planet. Collect energy rich meteorites that power up an escape portal to another planet, be ware of the dangerous subproducts generated by your ship when consuming meteorites, they will deplete your energy. Charge up and head to more shrinking planets! Good luck exploring the galaxy!

Special Thanks:

  • Benjamin Miranda: for making our amazing logo
  • Oscar Echeverria: playtesting
  • Blackhole icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • Icons used on Logo made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  • And really special thanks to our loved ones, to for all the support, you girls, rock!!
